io.netty.buffer

Interface ByteBufHolder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ReferenceCounted
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Attribute, FileUpload, FullHttpMessage, FullHttpRequest, FullHttpResponse, HttpContent, HttpData, LastHttpContent, SpdyDataFrame
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDiskHttpData, AbstractHttpData, AbstractMemoryHttpData, BinaryWebSocketFrame, CloseWebSocketFrame, ContinuationWebSocketFrame, DatagramPacket, DefaultByteBufHolder, DefaultFullHttpRequest, DefaultFullHttpResponse, DefaultHttpContent, DefaultLastHttpContent, DefaultSpdyDataFrame, DiskAttribute, DiskFileUpload, MemoryAttribute, MemoryFileUpload, MixedAttribute, MixedFileUpload, PingWebSocketFrame, PongWebSocketFrame, SctpMessage, TextWebSocketFrame, UdtMessage, WebSocketFrame

    public interface ByteBufHolder
extends ReferenceCounted
    A packet which is send or receive.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ByteBuf content()
      Return the data which is held by this ByteBufHolder.
      ByteBufHolder copy()
      Create a deep copy of this ByteBufHolder.
      ByteBufHolder duplicate()
      Duplicate the ByteBufHolder.
      ByteBufHolder retain()
      Increases the reference count by 1.
      ByteBufHolder retain(int increment)
      Increases the reference count by the specified increment.

      • Methods inherited from interface io.netty.util.ReferenceCounted

        refCnt, release, release

    • Method Detail

        Create a deep copy of this ByteBufHolder.

      • duplicate

        ByteBufHolder duplicate()
        Duplicate the ByteBufHolder. Be aware that this will not automatically call retain().
